alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Northwest Carter; Northwest Greene; Southeast Carter; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sullivan, Washington, northeastern Greene, northeastern Unicoi, west central Johnson and Carter Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gray, or near Johnson City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Greeneville, Elizabethton, Jonesborough, Tusculum, Central, Spurgeon and Midway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Johnson; Northwest Carter; Northwest Greene; Southeast Carter; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington
